category: Member sport group regulations/Article 12 (Reasons for exclusion from general meeting resolution)
contents: Article 12 (Reasons for exclusion from general meeting resolution) If the chairman or delegates fall under any of the following, they may not participate in the resolution. 1. When deciding on matters concerning oneself in the election or dismissal of executives 2. When matters involving the exchange of money and property conflict with the interests of oneself and the member sports organization Revised on October 6, 2021
